content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(4.0, -63.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -63.0) with no ingredients to smelt and currently producing copper plates.

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position x) with no power and is set to research automation using automation science packs.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to harvest resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest before attempting to harvest. Move closer to the target resource if necessary.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
